From: Sina Iravanian <sina_iravanian@...>
Subject: NEAT for learning coordination
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=144001815; y=v-J3O-XUyY--_AS4mDVU2-bJ34KeHIsuYqJ5J5V1IQBSs33yGQK2m-A
X-Yahoo-Profile: sina_iravanian

Hi all,

I want to use NEAT for learning coordination in a multi-agent system.
But the agents in the system must be learning independently, i.e., they cannot communicate and a centralized controller cannot be used. 

I would be grateful if anyone could introduce some previous work, or publications which use NEAT (or any of its variants) in the same settings. 

Many thanks in advance,
Sina
